name: Crazy Goats
description:
Foxes are one of the natural enemies of the majestic goat. 

So why not fight them?

This game is an Angry birds like clone made just for learning and fun.  The art and coding is done by me.

Music by:

Wanderlust by Scott Buckley

  https://soundcloud.com/scottbuckley
